name: Lucky Critters
description:
This is the polished version of Lucky Critters originally done for the GMTK 2022, where it had some rough edges due to the time constraint. If reviewing our game please still rate it by the old ones standards, we are publishing this just for fun, and hope to get our submission done in time next year!

Controls: all you need is mouse!

This game is obviously heavily inspired by pokemon, with a twist! We have added a luck meter to balance out bad RNG. If you miss a high accuracy move, you will be almost guaranteed to hit it next turn! We hope you'll enjoy our little game!

Credits:

Lead Programming: clay

Additional Programming: Wisdom @huseyin_kilic

Art: anrandomhuman

Sound: Osophy @mf_composer/ bandcam

All art, music and most coding was done during the GMTK game jam.

Thanks for playing!
